title: MALAVOI: the almost complete discography [MP3 LAME -V 2]
description:
NOTE: I HAD TO UPLOAD THIS TORRENT TO THE "OTHER" CATEGORY BECAUSE TPB COMPLAINS ABOUT THE PRESENCE OF A .TXT FILE  IN A MUSIC UPLOAD!

This torrent contains pretty much everything I could find about the famous Martinican band MALAVOI.

I am aware that a very few songs (mostly from their early days) are still missing, as are the various DVDs of their performances.
Unfortunately, Malavoi material has become almost impossible to find!
Practically all of their merchandise is out of print / no longer available.
If you happen to still have some Malavoi stuff laying around, please share it!!

In addition to the discography (see below), this torrent also includes an ethnomusical analysis of the group and their music,
from the book Awakening Spaces by Brenda F. Berrian (Adobe Acrobat PDF-1.4, OCR'ed with ABBYY FineReader 9.0 Professional Edition).
I have also added a bunch of video files I captured on Youtube, Dailymotion etc and transcoded to AVI (XViD 1.1.2, 320 x 240, ~400kbps).
As you might expect, the quality of these videos is pretty lousy!

Finally, note that Malavoi also wrote the soundtrack to the film "Rue Cases-NÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¨gres" (Sugar Cane Alley) which I have uploaded as a separate torrent.


Technical information
* MP3 VBR 192 kbps, 44100 Hz, LAME version 3.98.2 (-V 2)
* Completely tagged (as far as possible, sometimes including lyrics, composer, involved people...) with ID3v2.4 using Media Monkey 3.1
* Volume analyzed with ReplayGain, BPM determined with MixMeister BPM Analyzer
* Note that some of the MP3 tags are subjective. Just because I rate a song 2 stars doesn't mean you won't like it!
* Cover art is embedded in the audio files and also included as "high-ish" resolution JPG files.
